text: I was looking for a post on the HS Idea forum and ran into this - best waste of 15 minutes to flip through all the posts. <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/I-want-a-pony/idi-p/178052>

I love how that post has more responses from HubSpot people in it then the others though. Kinda irked me at first as there are many ideas out there with votes that have no feedback on them at all yet something like this has a ton replies from HS. #Salty
Yea Iâ€™ll be honest I felt the exact same way. Still appreciated their sense of humor though.
Agreed, its nice to see a company have a sense of humor. Makes them human. #TotallyNotARobot
